text: == Events == * Emperor Go-Reizei ascends the throne of Japan. * Harold Godwinson becomes Earl of Wessex. * Edward the Confessor marries Edith of Wessex. * Edward the Confessor begins construction on Westminster Abbey. * Pope Benedict IX sells the Papacy to Pope Gregory VI. * Movable type printing is invented by Bi Sheng in China. == Births == * Stephen I, Count of Blois (died 1102) == Deaths == * June â€“ Rainulf Drengot, Norman adventurer.
